description:
Gamma is hit by Gokudera`s attack. He begins to remember when he first met his boss, Yuni. It all began when the Gesso Family, led by Byakuran, attacked the Giglionero Family, which was the foundation of the Black Spells. Gamma escaped from enemies and arrived at the Giglio Nero`s safe house. He is shocked to find out that his boss has been killed. Yuni appears before him. Gamma remembers the merging of the Giglionero and the Gesso, and the creation of the detestable Millefiore Family…
Source: crunchyroll
